title: Hacked account
body: I'm reporting this issue for a friend of mine that is unfortunately unable to. His account has been hacked and the email connected to his account has been changed. Thus he can't change his password nor contact Riot Games. Please inform me for possible ways to recover an account under those circumstances.

replies.body:
We can assist your friend will recovering their account if they write in a support ticket using [_this form_](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide **as much information as possible** about their account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
did u ever get a response as i am expierencing the same thing?
